    • askAnswer

      public java.lang.String askAnswer​(boolean needCountDown) throws TimeOutException
      this method is used to check on the buffer's updates for any user's input and establishes a countDown for the user when needed
      Parameters:
      needCountDown - boolean, indicates if the asks need countdown of 2 minutes of user's inactivity
      Returns:
      String, the user's answer
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

    • eraseBuffer

      public void eraseBuffer()
      this method clears the buffer content

    • findQuitInString

      public boolean findQuitInString​(java.lang.String answer)
      this method verifies if the user is quitting (by writing "quit" or "Quit" or "QUIT") by using class regex
      Parameters:
      answer - String to check
      Returns:
      boolean , tells if the user actually wrote "quit" or "Quit" or "QUIT"

    • findRestartInString

      public boolean findRestartInString​(java.lang.String answer)
      this method verifies if the user wants to restart (by writing "RESTART" or "Restart" or "restart") by using class regex
      Parameters:
      answer - String to check
      Returns:
      boolean , tells if the user actually wrote "RESTART" or "Restart" or "restart"

    • askNumber

      public int askNumber​(boolean needCountDown) throws java.lang.NumberFormatException, TimeOutException
      this method handles the answer inserted by the player when expected a number
      Parameters:
      needCountDown - boolean, represents the need for the ask to have a count down
      Returns:
      int, the answer expected
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - exception thrown when the string does not contain a number that can be parsed

    • askPosition

      public int askPosition​(java.util.List<int[]> positions) throws TimeOutException
      this method manages with regex the coordinates inserted in cli by the player, like A5 or B2
      Specified by:
      askPosition in interface View
      Parameters:
      positions - list of coordinates available sent by the server
      Returns:
      int, index of the correspondent coordinate inserted by the user
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

    • cleanPosition

      public java.lang.String cleanPosition​(java.lang.String answer, java.util.regex.Matcher matcher)
      this method "cleans" String answer of useless characters inserted by the player when inserting coordinates
      Parameters:
      answer - the coordinates inserted by the player that may contain wrong characters such as spaces or "รยน" ecc
      matcher - of regex pattern found in answer
      Returns:
      String, the position interpreted by cli

      Parameters:

      action - action made
      destination - destination of the action
      Returns:
